Unique and Fun Gameplay

To make the chicken walk, you simply whisper or talk softly. To jump, you need to raise your voice or even scream. These vocal controls set Chicken Scream apart from other games, making it a truly one-of-a-kind experience.

Imagine the fun and challenge of coordinating your vocal expressions to help a chicken avoid spikes, jump over gaps, and collect coins. The novelty of this gameplay mechanic is engaging and offers endless laughter, not just for you but also for anyone watching you play.

4. Tap the search button and search for 'Scream Chicken'.

5. Select the filter and record your gameplay video.

Remember to be mindful of your surroundings while playing to avoid disturbing anyone around you with your screams. Sharing your gameplay on TikTok is a great way to engage with the community and enjoy a good laugh with others.

Whether you have an iPhone or an Android device, you can easily download the game and start playing. The game is free to download, which means you can enjoy all the entertainment without any initial cost.

Moreover, Chicken Scream has minimal system requirements, making it compatible with older devices as well. It requires Android 4.1 or higher, ensuring that almost anyone with a smartphone can join in on the fun.
